item.title: Machine Learning Week2 Assignment
item.author: Author
item.description: This article is for the solution of week 2 assignment of Machine Learning by Andrew Ng. Assignment Introduction In this exercise, you need to implement one variable linear regression. The course has provided several files you would like to use and some of them you need to modify to implement the algorithm. Following list is the files they provide: ex1.m - Octave/MATLAB script that steps you through the exercise ex1 multi.
